refsect1.title: Example
refsect1.para: This example adds an XML content trigger to the data of XS-S-1. The main features of this example are:

itemizedlist.listitem: Display a list of documents held in a table.
Add a new document or delete an existing one.
Show the hits found by the triggers.
The URI for the document is entered, and the system goes to retrieve it using xml_uri_get().
The document is inserted into a table.
If the document is HTML it is converted to XHTML with xml_tree() HTML mode.
If the HTML is not in a valid format or the document at the URI is not found, an error is reported.
There is a list of the rows in the documents table.
Each row has a delete button, to remove the document.
The triggers page allows triggers to be added and deleted. When a trigger is deleted the hits are also deleted.
Some pre-existing triggers look for text of specific tags in the XS-S-1 material.
The hits are listed on this page.
The hits page has a delete all button, to remove the hits.
